content: january hat aa ffrreeee ppaatttteerrnn bbyy ccoouurrttnneeyy kkeelllleeyy kelbourne woolens year of hats january hat ccoouurrttnneeyy kkeelllleeyy specifications abbrevations yarn mb make bobble k1 p1 k1 into same st turn kelbourne woolens germantown 100% n american p3tog turn slip st onto rh ndl wool 220 yds/100 gm skein sage 340 1 skein c1/2rp slide 1 st to cn hold back k2 p1 from cn gauge c2/1lp slide 2 sts to cn hold front p1 k2 from cn 1 patt repeat 18 sts and 28 rnds = 3 25 8 cm wide and c1/2rm slip last st of round to cn hold back slm to rh ndl 4 75 12 cm long after blocking k2 from lh ndl p1 from cn needles c2/1lm remove m sl2 to cn hold front p1 replace m 1 16 40 cm us 6 4 mm circular k2 from cn 1 16 40 cm us 7 4 5 mm circular c2/1/2lp sl 2 sts to cn hold front sl 1 st to cn hold back 1 set us 7 4 5 mm dpns k2 p1 from back cn k2 from front cn check your gauge and adjust needle size s accordingly if necessary notions for additional commonly used abbreviations in this and darning needle stitch marker s 2 cable needles other kelbourne woolens patterns visit size kelbournewoolens com/abbreviations 16 25 41 25 cm circumference unstretched 8 75 22 25 cm height stitch patterns skills brim ribbing in the round over a mult of 18 knitting purling cable patterns from charts bobbles round 1 *k2 p1 k2 p1 k1 6x p1 repeat from * around repeat round 1 for patt worthy of note the january hat is worked in the round from the bottom up due to the traveling cable starting with round 3 the beginning of the round shifts to the right one stitch on odd numbered round for the first 12 rounds the beginning of the round then shifts back on odd numbered rounds 15 25 then back again for the top decreases the shift is written into the pattern and the marker should always fall before the k2 of the first diamond cable motif for even numbered rounds 2 12 on the previous round work in pattern to one stitch before the end of round then work the c1/2r at the beginning of the round as a c1/2rm to move the marker one stitch to the right for odd numbered rounds 15 25 work the c2/1l at the beginning of the round as a c2/1lm to move the marker one stitch to the left you will not be moving the marker on rounds 26 28 ©2019 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 2 january hat ccoouurrttnneeyy kkeelllleeyy directions finishing break yarn leaving an 8 20 cm tail thread through live brim sts and fasten_off soak in cool water and wool wash and using smaller ndl co 90 sts join for working in the round block to measurements being careful not to twist sts pm indicating
